summary.para: Performs a local response normalization (LRN) function on the input. This operator performs the following computation.
summary.code: Output = Input / (Bias + (Alpha / LocalSize) * sum(Input^2 for every Input in the local region))^Beta
summary.para: The data type and size of the input and output tensors must be the same.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The tensor containing the input data. This tensor's Sizes should be { BatchCount, ChannelCount, Height, Width }.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The tensor to write the results to. This tensor's Sizes should match the InputTensor.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.CrossChannel
member.summary: TRUE if the LRN layer sums across channels; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.LocalSize
member.summary: The number of elements to sum over per dimension: Width, Height, and optionally Channel (if CrossChannel is set). This value must be at least 1.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.Alpha
member.summary: The value of the scaling parameter. A value of 0.0001 is recommended as default.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.Beta
member.summary: The value of the exponent. A value of 0.75 is recommended as default.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.Bias
member.summary: The value of bias. A value of 1 is recommended as default.
